Package eg.edittools

Class TextSearch

java.lang.Object
eg.edittools.TextSearch
public class TextSearch
extends java.lang.Object
The search and replacemant of text or words in the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the main editor area

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TextSearch()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void replace​(java.lang.String searchTerm, java.lang.String replacement)
    Replaces a selected search term or searches the next occurrence of the search term and, if found, selects it
    void replaceAll​(java.lang.String searchTerm, java.lang.String replacement)
    Replaces all occurrences of the search term
    void searchText​(java.lang.String searchTerm)
    Searches the next occurence of the search term and, if found, selects it
    void setCaseSensitivity​(boolean b)
    Sets the boolean that indicates if the text search is case sensitive.
    void setDocument​(EditableDocument doc)
    Sets the EditableDocument which text is searched in
    void setRequireWord​(boolean b)
    Sets the boolean that indicates if the search is restricted to a word; default is not restricted
    void setUpwardSearch​(boolean b)
    Sets the boolean that indicates the search direction.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • setDocument

      Sets the EditableDocument which text is searched in
      Parameters:
      doc - the EditableDocument

    • setRequireWord

      public void setRequireWord​(boolean b)
      Sets the boolean that indicates if the search is restricted to a word; default is not restricted
      Parameters:
      b - the boolen value

    • setUpwardSearch

      public void setUpwardSearch​(boolean b)
      Sets the boolean that indicates the search direction. True for upward and false for downward. Default is downward.
      Parameters:
      b - the boolean value

    • setCaseSensitivity

      public void setCaseSensitivity​(boolean b)
      Sets the boolean that indicates if the text search is case sensitive. Default is insensitive.
      Parameters:
      b - the boolean value

    • searchText

      public void searchText​(java.lang.String searchTerm)
      Searches the next occurence of the search term and, if found, selects it
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - the search term

    • replace

      public void replace​(java.lang.String searchTerm, java.lang.String replacement)
      Replaces a selected search term or searches the next occurrence of the search term and, if found, selects it
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - the search term
      replacement - the replacement for the search term

    • replaceAll

      public void replaceAll​(java.lang.String searchTerm, java.lang.String replacement)
      Replaces all occurrences of the search term
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - the search term
      replacement - the replacement for the search term
